Defeating Matora

By Anonymous on Monday, December 10, 2001 - 04:56 pm:

Can any body tell me how to beat Matora. I just started playing 2 months ago. She kept using Arid Land and I kept losing because of my monster's low life points. Thanks.

By danz on Monday, December 10, 2001 - 09:59 pm:

theres no *METHOD* to beating her, just keep trying different strategies etc. and you'll get her eventually

By Josh on Wednesday, July 23, 2003 - 09:56 pm:

By AtariMan541 on Tuesday, July 6, 2004 - 01:19 pm:

well actually there is a stratagy that you can use to just beat her all you have to do once she plays arid land is try to keep using intelligence attacks on her zilla than on her usaba just use ariel shots to take it down ariel shot could also be used on her pixie
